title: Help with a Build for Sejuani
body: Hi i just play sejuani as a support would like to know if i can build her as AD

replies.body: All her skills have an ok Ap ratio so building her Ap will be better than building AD because if you are gonna build AD items on her you will need to auto attack a lot and her attack speed growth is one of the worst in the game. So i wouldn't recommend building AD on her. The best way is probably just build tank. Assuming u are asking for a support build maybe try this : {{item:3401}} {{item:3800}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3117}}{{item:2045}}   . Not sure how this build would work but it should work very well if you ever get to full build :P. Other than that max Q and E 1st for the CC because i don't think W will be very useful. Try to get 10% CDR from masteries and you will have 40% cdr with frozen heart and Face of the mountain, with 40% cdr your ult will hopefully be up everytime u need it for the teamfights.
I'm not really sure how that would work or be good but you could search some builds and test it. I wouldn't recommend going bot lane, probably top lane. Good luck :D
